title: Creamy Vegetable Pie
ingredients: ['3 parsnips, peeled and cut into 1.25cm pieces', '3 carrots, peeled and cut into 1.25cm pieces', '1 sweet potato, peeled and cut into 1.25cm pieces', '50g butter', '140g sliced mushrooms', '90g chopped leeks', '3 tablespoons plain flour', '475ml vegetable stock', '1/8 teaspoon dried thyme', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste', '1/4 teaspoon hot pepper sauce', '275g plain scone baking mix', '175ml milk']
